Entries.default: "Prepare yourself for a tidal wave like none you have ever seen!"
"Use this! 'Twill chain your foe as I was chained."
"Come, Watcher! The fury of the Godhammer is ready!"
"Readying the best waves takes time! Do not rush your king!"
"Go. Prove your strength. I shall prepare the chains."
"I need time, Watcher. This is no simple task."
